00289 
00290 inline bool TileImportanceTable::
00291 isValidImportanceNbr( int importanceNbr,
00292                       int detailLevel ) const {
00293    if ( importanceNbr < 0 ||
00294         detailLevel < 0 ) {
00295       return false;
00296    }
00297 
00298    // must have a valid detail level too
00299    if ( static_cast<uint32>( detailLevel ) < m_importanceMatrix.size() ) {
00300       return static_cast< uint32 >( importanceNbr ) < 
00301          (*m_importanceMatrix[ detailLevel ] ).size();
00302    }
00303    return false;
00304 }
